A printer can be used to print out a map of a room or building to help you navigate it more easily. Simply print out a floor plan and use it as a guide.
Printer ink can be used as a dye for fabric or paper. Dilute it with water and apply it to your material for a unique, one-of-a-kind design.
A printer can be used to print out a list of items you need to buy at the grocery store. Use it as a shopping list to help you stay organized and focused.
Printer paper can be used as a template for creating 3D models. Simply fold the paper into the desired shape and use it as a guide to create your model.
A printer can be used to print out a list of important dates or events. Use it as a reminder to stay on top of your schedule.
